name: You, Me & Technology (2022)
description: This prototype is being considered for a Master's project. My UTS Master's project uses practice-based research to explore visualising complex social issues in VR vignettes. This experience is part of the suite of practical components, including a mixed-reality video, discursive diagrams, a written document and this VR experience prototype.  This iteration is a semi-interactive prototype with some of the interactive qualities removed. This prototype is understood through the scope of the project.
